result.name: land-registry-application-completed-2019-2020
result.notes:
This dataset shows the number of applications for registration completed by LPS Registrations (Northern Ireland) - specifically Land Registry in the financial year 2019-2020.  Data is sorted by the main application types i.e.
 DOW(Dealing of Whole); TOP (Transfer of Part of a folio); Lease(Leasehold applications); First Registration (Applications for to register property for the first time in Land Registry) Sections 53 (application for registration under Adverse Possession); Deed of Rectification (applications to amend errors made by previous submissions). Figures include application completed, abandoned and withdrawn.

organization.name: open-data-ni
organization.title: OpenDataNI
organization.description:
[OpenDataNI] (https://www.opendatani.gov.uk) is the brand name for the Open Data portal which facilitates easy access to Northern Ireland public sector data for both reuse and redistribution. 

OpenDataNI has been developed as part of the Digital NI initiative. Digital NI aims to help establish a culture within Northern Ireland that develops and enhances Digital capability not just through interactions with Government, but also with local companies and throughout communities. Within government the Digital Transformation Service is facilitating this cultural shift through a number of methods, transforming Government services, making data open and available and encouraging and coaching those who lack digital skills.

It is recognised that opening up our data is the right thing to do in terms of transparency, accountability and efficiency of the Public Sector in Northern Ireland. It has the potential to encourage new commercial opportunities and drive economic growth and innovation across public and private sectors.

result.title: Land Registry applications completed 2019-2020

resources.description: This dataset shows the number of applications completed for the 6 main application type for the year 2019-2020
resources.name: Applications Completed by Application Type
